text: A vast mountain range extended beyond Maesaki City.
It had once been dotted with villages engaged in forestry, but in the era of rural flight they had disappeared one after another.
Before long, various means of transportation were cut off, and now it had become a forgotten and secluded region that not even climbers came by very often.

name: Cerastes
text: It's supposed to be around here somewhere... but this is the middle of the friggin' mountains. Is the GPS just busted?
Starkly contrasting with the calming green around her, a woman with flaming red hair was wandering restlessly while glaring at her GPS.
Her name was Cerastes. She was a capable mercenary who had fought across battlefronts all over the world from a young age.

name: Cerastes
text: Hmm, where the hell is it...?
She seemed to be looking for something and was constantly peering in the shadows of boulders and turning over fallen trees.
Thenー

name: Masked Man
text: Hey, who are you?!

name: Wind-Clad Man
text: What are you doing in a place like this?
Suddenly, armed men appeared and surrounded Cerastes.

name: Cerastes
text: Hm? And who the hell are you?

name: Cerastes
text: I'm just looking for something. I'm not in the mood to tussle with some randos for no pay, so get lost.

name: Masked Man
text: Pay... You're a mercenary?

name: Cerastes
text: Yeah, but I'm off the clock now.

name: Wind-Clad Man
text: What the hell is a mercenary looking for this deep in the mountains?

name: Cerastes
text: What's it to you? Pain in the ass...
A look of irritation appeared on Cerastes's face.
Killing people without a reward wasn't a hobby of hers, but it was a different story when they got in her way.
There seemed to be only two of them, so maybe she could take care of them with one blowー
Just as she was thinking that...

name: Masked Woman
text: Don't move. Answer the question.

name: Wind-Clad Woman
text: We'll show you no mercy if you resist.
When had they snuck up on her? A pair who seemed to be allied with the men appeared and pointed their blades at her from behind.

name: Cerastes
text: Hmm...? You guys are no ordinary humans, are you? The way you hid your presence was quite impressive.
Cerastes's eyes were lighting up. Her inner battle maniac was starting to itch.

name: Cerastes
text: (Who are these guys? Things are getting a little interesting.)

name: Masked Man
text: Answer the question.

name: Cerastes
text: And if I said, "go fuck yourselves"?

name: Wind-Clad Man
text: What did you say...!?
Their swelling thirst for blood was chided by the woman who seemed to be the leader.

name: Masked Woman
text: Wait. It's been quite a while since we lost contact with the advance squad. We don't have time to deal with strange women here.

name: Masked Man
text: ...You're right.

name: Wind-Clad Woman
text: We've warned you. Leave.

name: Cerastes
text: ーHuh? They disappeared? Hm? Huh?
There was no longer any sign of them anywhere. The strange humans had vanished just like the wind.

name: Cerastes
text: ーAh!? Maybe those guys were Japanese ninja!?

name: Cerastes
text: Holy shit!! I bumped into some ninja!
A short while after the encounter with the humans.

name: Cerastes
text: Man, I fiiiiinally found it. So this is the Cave of the Serpent God or whatever it's called...
Cerastes had found the cave she had been looking for at last.

name: Cerastes
text: But still, those guys earlier, were they really ninja!?

name: Cerastes
text: I should've asked them to let me take a picture. And I want them to show me their moves too...

name: Cerastes
text: Ah, no, wait. Anyway, it's all about the Serpent God right now!
Cerastes stepped into the cave and, despite the poor footing, quickly moved deeper.

name: Cerastes
text: It's so quiet...
As she focused and pressed forward through the winding serpentine cave, she suddenly emerged into a giant chamber.
There was an underground lake filled with fresh water, its banks littered with decrepit tools and bones. They must have been used in rituals.

name: Cerastes
text: Serpent God, huh...
She picked up some of the fragments and threw them into the underground lake.

name: Cerastes
text: Humans are such arbitrary creatures. A devil in one country and a god in the next?

name: Cerastes
text: If I had been born in a different age, I wonder if I would've been treated like a god too. Makes me laugh.
Cerastes had taken on the form of a human, but her true form was that of a half-human, half-serpent demon called a Nagi.
However, having been raised by humans in the human world, she never knew of the Devildom or any others of her kind.
When she was a child, her appearance attracted strange looks, and she was teased and bullied.
Undaunted, she had honed her strength and was able to make a living as a mercenary from an early age.
And, having learned about the Devildom and demons while traveling from battlefield to battlefield...
...she had thought she wanted to learn about her own kind, and was now researching serpent-related legends in every country she visited.
And what she had set her sights on upon arriving in Japan was this cave.

There had once been a village in this area that had believed in the divinity of snakes, and this cave, which was said to have been an object of faith for hundreds of years, had been called the "Dwelling of the Serpent God."
However, after the village had become uninhabited, there were none left who worshipped the Serpent God, and even the existence of the cave had been forgotten.

name: Cerastes
text: This is a big-ass cave. It seems to go on further, but the path forward is inside the underground lake huh?
She was mulling over things like, "I could dive into the water to check it out, but if there was no exit then even I would die."

name: Masked Man
text: That woman from earlier, I didn't expect her to come this far.

name: Masked Woman
text: Does she have anything to do with the annihilation of the advance squad?

name: Cerastes
text: !? The ninja from before!? Where the hell did you come from!?

name: Cerastes
text: (Holy crap, I didn't detect their presence at all until just now...)
Cerastes was normally unfazed by being surrounded by enemies in an enclosed space, but she was more than a little surprised this time.

name: Cerastes
text: (And I mean, this is a cave. Does this mean they came all the way here through the cave without letting me sense them?)
In a cave, shrouded in silence and darkness, even the slightest sound reverberated loudly, and movements created a flow of air.
It would probably be impossible even for skilled soldiers to conceal their presence. Not to mention that Cerastes was a Nagi and had senses sharper than those of humans.

name: Cerastes
text: (So they are ninja?! The real deal?!!)

name: Cerastes
text: (What should I do? Should I try fighting them like this? Or should I ask them for a keepsake photo first?)

name: Masked Man
text: Hey, what are you grinning about?

name: Cerastes
text: Hehe. I guess fighting them comes first! If I win, I'll have you guys take a picture with me!

name: Masked Man
text: Huh???
And just when the ninja(?) and Cerastes glared at each otherー
*Splooshhhhh!!*
Suddenly, a huge splash echoed all around as water sprayed throughout the cave.

name: Cerastes
text: !? What the!?

name: Masked Man
text: Oh shit!

name: Monster
text: 『HHSSSSSSKK!!!!』
What had jumped out of the underground lake was a gigantic snake monster.

name: Wind-Clad Man
text: So it showed up! Damn it, take this! Wind Art: Gust!
The wind-clad ninja initiated his Jutsu and aimed it at the face of the giant snake.

name: Masked Man
text: No! Don't look at it!

name: Wind-Clad Man
text: Eh?ー

name: Masked Man
text: ...Too late.
It happened in an instant. The ninja who was targeted by the wrathful stare of the snake froze in place and turned to stone.

name: Masked Man
text: Damn it! First I'm gonna crush those eyes!
While avoiding the gaze of the snake, the masked ninja leaped up and closed in on its face.

name: Gigantic Snake
text: 『HHSSSSSKK!!』

name: Masked Man
text: Ugh!? Hngh!? Blaaarrgh...
However, he came into contact with the miasma that the giant snake had spewed, and he fell while tearing at his throat.

name: Cerastes
text: Wh-What's going on!?
Cerastes was momentarily taken aback by the massacre unfolding before her eyes.

name: Cerastes
text: Regardless, I'm screwed if this keeps up!!
But she quickly regained her composure and raised her huge rifle, aiming it at the gigantic snake's throat.

name: Gigantic Snake
text: 『HHSSKK...』
Perhaps having noticed her presence, the gigantic snake turned around and glared at her with its keen eyes.

name: Cerastes
text: Shit!!
She thought she'd be turned to stoneーbut her finger was free from any hardening as she pulled the trigger.
*Bang!*

name: Gigantic Snake
text: 『HSSKK!?』
A direct hitーbut the bullets had ricocheted off the scales.

name: Cerastes
text: No friggin' way!?

name: Gigantic Snake
text: 『HHSSSSKK!』
Perhaps due to becoming agitated, the startled snake began to spray its poisonous breath around haphazardly.

name: Wind-Clad Woman
text: U-Ughhh...

name: Masked Woman
text: I-It's no good, retreat...
All the ninja who had been hit by the poisonous breath collapsed all too easily on the spot.

name: Cerastes
text: Yo, ninja guys!?

name: Cerastes
text: ...Hm, I'm alright. Does it only work on humans?
Cerastes rushed through the poisonous breath and fired off bullets from point-blank range.
*Bang!!!*
*Boom!!!*

name: Gigantic Snake
text: 『HSSK!?』

name: Cerastes
text: Shit!! How friggin' tough is this thing!?
No matter how many bullets she fired, the scales showed barely any signs of damage.

name: Gigantic Snake
text: 『HHSSSSKK!』
But the giant snake still seemed to feel the pain and tried to sweep Cerastes aside with its enormous tail.

name: Cerastes
text: Nice miss!
Cerastes jumped back, took refuge behind a nearby boulder, and observed the gigantic snake.

name: Cerastes
text: The legendary Serpent God... is definitely this thing, right?

name: Cerastes
text: Don't tell me that thing is what the Nagi have become? Will I also end up like this in a few hundred years...?

name: Me
text: Wrong. This is a basilisk. It's an underling of the Nagi.
As Cerastes turned around, three new ninja were standing there.
ーNo, something about them was a little different from the earlier ninja.

name: Uehara Shikanosuke
text: Whoa, what is that thing!? It's super gigantic!!

name: Me
text: Don't look into its eyes, you two! You'll turn to stone!

name: Aishu Hebiko
text: You don't have to tell Hebiko! But it's pretty difficult.

name: Cerastes
text: (A young one, a scared one, and... an octopus...?)

name: Hebiko
text: What's the call, Fuma-chan?

name: Me
text: First, we help the others. They should be fine if we hurry and get them treatment.

name: Shikanosuke
text: But what do we do about that snake!?

name: Me
text: This woman and I will deal with the Basilisk, together.

name: Cerastes
text: Huh!? Me!?

name: Me
text: Hebiko and Shikanosuke, you two go and rescue the fallen Taimanin.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Are you going to face that stupidly huge snake with a stranger!? Are you out of your mind, Fuma!?

name: Me
text: It's alright, I have an idea. Just trust me and go, quickly!

name: Hebiko
text: Got it! Make sure to properly explain everything later!
The two replied. Then they picked up the collapsed ninja and started running toward the exit.

name: Cerastes
text: Hey, I don't know who you are, but you're spouting off some pretty half-assed shit. I'm the one squaring off against this monster, got it?
As Cerastes spoke, she assessed the man in front of her.
In an instant, he had grasped the situation and had ordered the rescue of those who had a chance of survival.
The young man who was capable of that, along with the two who had quickly rescued their fallen comrades, did not seem to be ordinary people.

name: Cerastes
text: (But still, he doesn't have the scent of someone powerful at all.)

name: Cerastes
text: You're weak, aren't you? Why did you stay behind?
Cerastes asked, getting straight to the point.

name: Me
text: Because being strong isn't enough to beat that thing. I'm Fuma. And you?

name: Cerastes
text: Cerastes. I'm a mercenary. Hey, are you a ninja too?

name: Me
text: Eh? Yeah, I am.

name: Cerastes
text: Hehe! Gotcha! Then I guess it's okay.

name: Cerastes
text: So what are you gonna do? Attacks really don't seem to get through to this thing.

name: Me
text: Bullets won't work. My blade most likely won't either. The only thing that can bring that monster down is your true power.

name: Cerastes
text: My true power?

name: Me
text: The basilisk's petrification and its poison didn't work on youーCerastes, you're a Nagi, aren't you?

name: Cerastes
text: Huh! You seem to know quite a bit! I like you. I've got a lot of things I want to ask you later. But first...
With that, Cerastes's lower body transformed, turning into the true form of the Nagi, half-human and half-serpent.

name: Cerastes
text: Let's let loose and send this thing packing!

name: Me
text: Yeah, let's go!
